column2:
"Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones.
My fears were completely unfounded, then."

"Partner cards allow you to invite the person
on the card to join you on your quest, even
after it starts."

"Heh. This reminds me of the old days, when
I'd partner up with just about anyone..."

"Marlu has issued a client order.

Marlu is in the gate area central hall."

"Ohza has issued a client order.

Ohza is in the gate area central hall."

"Lisa has issued a client order.

Lisa is in the gate area central hall."

"Azanami has issued a client order.

Azanami is in the gate area central hall."
